where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'APPLIED_DOCUMENT_REFERENCE.ITEMS' ) ) = 2

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( dr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'APPLIED_DOCUMENT_REFERENCE.ITEMS' ) | dr . assigned_document . kind \ document_type . product_data_type = 'language reference manual' ) ) = 1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | NOT ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'MODEL_PARAMETER' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( rr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_1' ) | ( rr \ representation_relationship . name = 'access mechanism' ) AND ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_PORT' IN TYPEOF ( rr . rep_2 ) ) ) ) >= 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ( NOT ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_WITH_ASSOCIATED_DOCUMENTS' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( docs <* SELF \ product_definition_with_associated_documents . documentation_ids | docs . kind \ document_type . product_data_type = 'CAD filename' ) ) <= 1 )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( adta <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'APPLIED_DATE_AND_TIME_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS' ) | adta . role \ date_time_role . name = 'creation date' ) ) + SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ada <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'APPLIED_DATE_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS' ) | ada . role \ date_role . name = 'creation date' ) ) = 1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'APPLIED_APPROVAL_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS' ) ) = 1

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( apoa <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'APPLIED_PERSON_AND_ORGANIZATION_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS' ) | apoa . role \ person_and_organization_role . name = 'creator' ) ) + SIZEOF ( QUERY ( apoa <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'APPLIED_ORGANIZATION_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS' ) | apoa . role \ organization_role . name = 'creator' ) ) >= 1

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'APPLIED_SECURITY_CLASSIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS' ) ) = 1

where.label: WR6
where.expression: SIZEOF ( TYPEOF ( SELF ) - ( TYPEOF ( SELF \ product_definition || SELF \ analytical_model_definition ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( [ 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL' ] * TYPEOF ( SELF . rep_1 ) ) = 1

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( [ 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL' ] * TYPEOF ( SELF . rep_2 ) ) = 1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( rr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_1' ) | NOT ( ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'MAKE_FROM_MODEL_PORT_RELATIONSHIP' IN TYPEOF ( rr . rep_2 ) ) ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( rr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_1' ) | NOT ( ( rr \ representation_relationship . name = 'associated make from' ) AND ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'MAKE_FROM_MODEL_PORT_RELATIONSHIP' IN TYPEOF ( rr . rep_2 ) ) ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF ( [ 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL' ] * TYPEOF ( SELF ) ) = 0

where.label: WR6
where.expression: SIZEOF ( TYPEOF ( SELF ) - ( TYPEOF ( SELF \ representation || SELF \ representation_relationship || SELF \ analytical_model_make_from_relationship ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( cri <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION.ITEMS' ) | ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL' IN TYPEOF ( cri ) ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( am <* QUERY ( rr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_2' ) | rr \ representation_relationship . name = 'access mechanism' ) | 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL' IN TYPEOF ( am . rep_1 ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) AND ( it \ representation_item . name = 'size' ) AND ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'COUNT_MEASURE' IN TYPEOF ( it \ measure_with_unit . value_component ) ) AND ( it \ measure_with_unit . value_component = 1 ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) AND ( it \ representation_item . name = 'size' ) AND ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'COUNT_MEASURE' IN TYPEOF ( it \ measure_with_unit . value_component ) ) AND ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'CONTEXT_DEPENDENT_UNIT' IN TYPEOF ( it \ measure_with_unit . unit_component ) ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( rr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_1' ) | 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'PARAMETER_ASSIGNMENT_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF ( rr . rep_2 ) ) ) >= 1

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( rr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_2' ) | 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL' IN TYPEOF ( rr . rep_1 ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) AND ( it \ representation_item . name = 'nominal signal flow direction' ) AND ( it \ descriptive_representation_item . description IN [ 'input direction' , 'output direction' , 'bidirectional' , 'unknown direction' ] ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) AND ( it \ representation_item . name = 'port type' ) AND ( it \ descriptive_representation_item . description IN [ 'string property type' , 'logical property type' , 'boolean property type' ] ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( [ 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_PORT' ] * TYPEOF ( SELF . rep_1 ) ) = 1

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( [ 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_PORT' ] * TYPEOF ( SELF . rep_2 ) ) = 1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( TYPEOF ( SELF ) - TYPEOF ( SELF \ representation || SELF \ representation_relationship || SELF \ make_from_model_port_relationship ) ) = 0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: rep_1 :<>: rep_2

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( rr1 <* USEDIN ( SELF . rep_1 , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_2' ) | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( rr2 <* USEDIN ( SELF . rep_2 , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_2' ) | ( rr1 . rep_1 :=: rr2 . rep_1 ) ) ) = 0 ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR6
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( rr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_2' ) | ( ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MAKE_FROM_RELATIONSHIP' ) IN TYPEOF ( rr . rep_1 ) ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'DESCRIPTIVE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) AND ( it \ representation_item . name = 'nominal signal flow direction' ) AND ( it \ descriptive_representation_item . description IN [ 'input direction' , 'output direction' , 'unknown direction' ] ) ) ) ) = 1

rule.name: analytical_model_port_unique_constraint
rule.algorithm: LOCAL name_bag : BAG OF STRING := [ ] ; amp_bag : BAG OF analytical_model_port ; rr_bag : BAG OF representation_relationship ; pass : BOOLEAN := TRUE ; am_bag : BAG OF analytical_model ; END_LOCAL ; REPEAT i := 1 to SIZEOF ( analytical_model_port ) by 1 ; IF EXISTS ( analytical_model_port [ i ] \ representation . name ) THEN IF ( NOT ( analytical_model_port [ i ] \ representation . name IN name_bag ) ) THEN name_bag := name_bag + analytical_model_port [ i ] \ representation . name ; END_IF ; END_IF ; END_REPEAT ; REPEAT i := 1 to SIZEOF ( name_bag ) by 1 ; IF ( NOT pass ) THEN ESCAPE ; END_IF ; amp_bag := QUERY ( amp <* analytical_model_port | ( amp \ representation . name = name_bag [ i ] ) ) ; am_bag := [ ] ; REPEAT j := 1 to SIZEOF ( amp_bag ) by 1 ; IF ( NOT pass ) THEN ESCAPE ; END_IF ; rr_bag := QUERY ( rr <* USEDIN ( amp_bag [ j ] , 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_2' ) | ( ( rr \ representation_relationship . name = 'access mechanism' ) AND ( 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_MIM.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL' IN TYPEOF ( rr . rep_1 ) ) ) ) ; REPEAT k := 1 to SIZEOF ( rr_bag ) by 1 ; IF EXISTS ( rr_bag [ k ] . rep_1 ) THEN IF ( rr_bag [ k ] . rep_1 IN am_bag ) THEN pass := FALSE ; ESCAPE ; ELSE am_bag := am_bag + rr_bag [ k ] . rep_1 ; END_IF ; END_IF ; END_REPEAT ; END_REPEAT ; END_REPEAT ;

where.label: WR1
where.expression: pass
